notify.desc: Send a notification to all subscribers.
notify.usage: Command must be a reply to some message.

rate.desc: Give YOUR rating to a movie you watched. Command must be a reply to some message.
rate.usage: `!rate NUMBER_BET_1_10 [Command must be a reply to some message.]`

add.desc: Add a movie to the database, requires GOD privilige.
add.usage: Must be a message in proper format, so that title and other details can be extracted

start.desc: You will recieve notifications from me
start.usage: You need to be a subscriber furst.

stop.desc: You will NOT recieve notifications from me
stop.usage: You need to be a subscriber furst.

suggest.desc: I'm bored, suggest me a movie.
